text: Ideally changing themes, but the main reason for this is that my client needs 1 template in a few different color variations.

Hello, I'm trying to send a transactional email through <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/marketing/transactional-emails|this endpoint>, but I'm getting this error: `There was an issue sending an email to this contact. Hmm. This 'from' address looks invalid` Do you know what could be wrong? Is there any specific rule to use an email in the "from" field?
Custom module with a drop down to pick a "theme", that changes the colours?
